name: df-mend
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3
body: |- wceq(cmend, cmpt(s0, universe, csb(s1, co(cv(s0), clmhm, cv(s0)), cun(ctp(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), cv(s1)), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), cmpo(s2, s3, cv(s1), cv(s1), co(cv(s2), cof(cfv(cplusg, cv(s0))), cv(s3)))), cop(cfv(cmulr, cnx), cmpo(s2, s3, cv(s1), cv(s1), ccom(cv(s2), cv(s3))))), cpr(cop(cfv(csca, cnx), cfv(csca, cv(s0))), cop(cfv(cvsca, cnx), cmpo(s2, s3, cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, cv(s0))), cv(s1), co(cxp(cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), csn(cv(s2))), cof(cfv(cvsca, cv(s0))), cv(s3)))))))))
bodyPretty: ‚ä¢ MEndo =(s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶[(s0[LMHom]s0)/ s1]({ <(Base ` ndx), s1 >, <(+ ` ndx),(s2 ‚àà s1, s3 ‚àà s1 ‚Ü¶(s2[oF((+ ` s0))]s3))>, <(√ó ` ndx),(s2 ‚àà s1, s3 ‚àà s1 ‚Ü¶(s2 ‚àò s3))> } ‚ãÉ { <(Scalar ` ndx),(Scalar ` s0)>, <(√ó ` ndx),(s2 ‚àà(Base `(Scalar ` s0)), s3 ‚àà s1 ‚Ü¶(((Base ` s0)√ó { s2 })[oF((√ó ` s0))]s3))> }))
comment: Define the endomorphism algebra of a module. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 2-Sep-2015.)
